name: searchconsole
title: Google Search Console URL Testing Tools API
description: Provides tools for running validation tests against single URLs

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

schemas.name: TestStatus
schemas.desc: Final state of the test, including error details if necessary.

enum.name: TEST_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED
enum.desc: Internal error when running this test. Please try running the test again.

enum.name: INTERNAL_ERROR
enum.desc:
Inspection terminated in an error state. This indicates a problem in
Google's infrastructure, not a user error. Please try again later.

enum.name: PAGE_UNREACHABLE
enum.desc:
Google can not access the URL because of a user error such as a robots.txt
blockage, a 403 or 500 code etc. Please make sure that the URL provided is
accessible by Googlebot and is not password protected.

fields.name: mimeType
fields.desc: The mime-type of the image data.

fields.name: data
fields.desc:
Image data in format determined by the mime type. Currently, the format
will always be "image/png", but this might change in the future.

fields.name: requestScreenshot
fields.desc: Whether or not screenshot is requested. Default is false.

enum.name: MOBILE_FRIENDLY_RULE_UNSPECIFIED
enum.desc:
Unknown rule. Sorry, we don't have any description for the rule that was
broken.

enum.name: USES_INCOMPATIBLE_PLUGINS
enum.desc:
Plugins incompatible with mobile devices are being used. [Learn more]
(https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6352293#flash_usage).

enum.name: CONFIGURE_VIEWPORT
enum.desc:
Viewsport is not specified using the meta viewport tag. [Learn more]
(https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6352293#viewport_not_configured).

enum.name: FIXED_WIDTH_VIEWPORT
enum.desc:
Viewport defined to a fixed width. [Learn more]
(https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6352293#fixed-width_viewport).

enum.name: SIZE_CONTENT_TO_VIEWPORT
enum.desc:
Content not sized to viewport. [Learn more]
(https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6352293#content_not_sized_to_viewport).

enum.name: USE_LEGIBLE_FONT_SIZES
enum.desc:
Font size is too small for easy reading on a small screen. [Learn More]
(https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6352293#small_font_size).

enum.name: TAP_TARGETS_TOO_CLOSE
enum.desc:
Touch elements are too close to each other. [Learn more]
(https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6352293#touch_elements_too_close).

schemas.name: RunMobileFriendlyTestResponse
schemas.desc:
Mobile-friendly test response, including mobile-friendly issues and resource
issues.

fields.name: testStatus
fields.desc: Final state of the test, can be either complete or an error.

fields.name: mobileFriendliness
fields.desc: Test verdict, whether the page is mobile friendly or not.

enum.name: MOBILE_FRIENDLY_TEST_RESULT_UNSPECIFIED
enum.desc: Internal error when running this test. Please try running the test again.

enum.name: NOT_MOBILE_FRIENDLY
enum.desc: The page is not mobile friendly.

schemas.name: ResourceIssue
schemas.desc: Information about a resource with issue.

methods.name: run
methods.desc: Runs Mobile-Friendly Test for a given URL.
